fieldDefinitions.title: The title of the work
fieldDefinitions.slug: The unique identifier for the Substack URL
fieldDefinitions.description: A short, clear summary of the work
fieldDefinitions.author: Author name
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: When the piece was emotionally experienced: timestamp + phase
fieldDefinitions.phase: The Ousia Bloom phase associated with the piece
fieldDefinitions.generatedBy: Which model generated this metadata and when

title: The Psalm of Conflicted Signals
description: A psalm-like reflection on a prophetic dream of danger, the tension between paths, and the search for where God is truly calling amid conflicting signals.
author: Aleksandr Veritas

motifMap.meaning: The cost of misdirection; the dangers of unclear signs
Conflicting influences; the bewilderment of Echo Moon
The travel between identities, futures, and callings
Two paths of hardship, both formative, neither safe

associatedMedia.description: No image provided in the metadata request; the Substack post contains no unique uploaded artwork.
